mapper.sql: sn, etcgoid, usertypecode, userid, userpw, username, email, mobile, birthyyyymmdd, lectnum, smsyn, emailyn, telyn, regdate, nickname, nickimg
mapper.select: SELECT sn,typecode,title,price FROM course WHERE tutorid = #{userid}

SELECT ut.userid,username,email,mobile,ut.regdate, ut.sn
, (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM course WHERE course.tutorid = ut.userid ) ttcnt
,ifnull(logindate,'-') logindate ,IFNULL(cucnt,'0') cucnt
, (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM cosuserzzim WHERE cosuserzzim.userid = ut.userid ) zzcnt
FROM usert ut
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT userid,MAX(logindate) logindate FROM loginhis GROUP BY userid ) lh on lh.userid = ut.userid
LEFT OUTER join ( SELECT userid,COUNT(*) cucnt FROM cosuser GROUP BY userid ) cu ON cu.userid = ut.userid
WHERE usertypecode like #{usertypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY username asc
ORDER BY username desc
ORDER BY ut.regdate asc
ORDER BY ut.regdate desc
ORDER BY email asc
ORDER BY email desc
ORDER BY mobile asc
ORDER BY mobile desc
ORDER BY cucnt asc
ORDER BY cucnt desc
ORDER BY zzcnt asc
ORDER BY zzcnt desc
LIMIT ${rowStart-1},10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT userid FROM usert ut WHERE usertypecode like #{usertypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) z

SELECT ut.sn, ut.usertypecode, uc.codename, ut.userid, ut.regdate, ut.username, ut.userpw, ut.email, ut.mobile, ut.birthyyyymmdd, ut.etcgoid, et.elsname FROM usert AS ut JOIN usercode AS uc ON ut.usertypecode = uc.code JOIN etcgo AS et ON ut.etcgoid = et.sn WHERE ut.usertypecode NOT IN ("TT", "ST") AND ut.sn = #{sn, jdbcType=INTEGER};
select userid,username from usert where username like concat('%',#{username},'%')

select
usert.sn, userid,
schoolunivfk ,
'' elsname ,
userpw, username, usertype, snstype, usyear, usban, usbun, usert.email, mobile, notiemail, notiesms, birthyyyymmdd, tutortype, activearea, addr, usimg, memo1, bankimg, regimg, careerimg, etcdocu1, etcdocu2, bankacc, gradu, kocode,
IFNULL((SELECT utjname FROM utjob WHERE utjcode = utjcode1 ),'-') utjcode1,
IFNULL((SELECT utjname FROM utjob WHERE utjcode = utjcode2 ),'-') utjcode2,
IFNULL((SELECT utjname FROM utjob WHERE utjcode = utjcode3 ),'-') utjcode3,
sppg3, spp3, sppsdate3, sppg2, spp2, sppsdate2, sppg1, spp1, sppsdate1,
jobm3, jobg3, jobedate3, jobsdate3, job3, jobm2, jobg2, jobedate2, jobsdate2, job2, jobm1, jobg1, jobedate1, jobsdate1, job1, result3, result2, result1, schedate1, schedate2, schedate3, schsdate1, schsdate2, schsdate3, grd3, grd2, grd1, sch3, sch2, sch1, tchjik, tchphone2,ttfile,ttppt,usert.zipcode,mobile22,email22
from usert left outer JOIN school ON school.sn = usert.schoolunivfk
where usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
${item} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' )
LIMIT ${rowStart-1}, 10

select sn, userid,
etcgosn ,
( select elsname from etcgo where etcgo.sn = usert.etcgosn ) elsname ,
userpw, username, usertype, snstype, usyear, usban, usbun, email, mobile, notiemail, notiesms, birthyyyymmdd, tutortype, activearea, addr, usimg, memo1, bankimg, regimg, careerimg, etcdocu1, etcdocu2, bankacc, gradu, kocode, utjcode1, utjcode2, utjcode3,
sppg3, spp3, sppsdate3, sppg2, spp2, sppsdate2, sppg1, spp1, sppsdate1,
jobm3, jobg3, jobedate3, jobsdate3, job3, jobm2, jobg2, jobedate2, jobsdate2, job2, jobm1, jobg1, jobedate1, jobsdate1, job1, result3, result2, result1, schedate1, schedate2, schedate3, schsdate1, schsdate2, schsdate3, grd3, grd2, grd1, sch3, sch2, sch1, tchjik, tchphone2,ttfile,ttppt,zipcode
from usert where sn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO usert ( userid,schoolunivfk, userpw,kocode, usertype,username, snstype,usyear,usban,usbun, email,mobile,birthyyyymmdd )
VALUES(
#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolunivfk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, '12345678', '000', 'ST',#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0',#{usyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{usban,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{usbun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'a@a.com','00000000','20200101' )
mapper.select:
select
sn, userid, schoolunivfk, userpw, username, usertype, snstype, usyear, usban, usbun, email, mobile, notiemail, notiesms, birthyyyymmdd, tutortype, activearea, addr, usimg, memo1, bankimg, regimg, careerimg, etcdocu1, etcdocu2, bankacc, gradu,
( SELECT cname FROM codet WHERE CODE = kocode AND category = '직업분야(직업군)' ) kocode,
( SELECT utjname FROM utjob WHERE utjcode = utjcode1 ) utjcode1,
( SELECT utjname FROM utjob WHERE utjcode = utjcode2 ) utjcode2,
( SELECT utjname FROM utjob WHERE utjcode = utjcode3 ) utjcode3,
sppg3, spp3, sppsdate3, sppg2, spp2, sppsdate2, sppg1, spp1, sppsdate1, jobm3, jobg3, jobedate3, jobsdate3, job3, jobm2, jobg2, jobedate2, jobsdate2, job2, jobm1, jobg1, jobedate1, jobsdate1, job1, result3, result2, result1, schedate1, schedate2, schedate3, schsdate1, schsdate2, schsdate3, grd3, grd2, grd1, sch3, sch2, sch1, tchjik, tchphone2,ttfile,ttppt,zipcode
from usert where sn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usert (usertypecode, userid, userpw, regdate, username, email, mobile, birthyyyymmdd, etcgoid) VALUES (#{usertypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userpw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_DATE(),#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=DATE}, #{birthyyyymmdd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etcgoid,jdbcType=INTEGER});

insert into usert ( userid, userpw, usertypecode, etcgoid, username, email, mobile, birthyyyymmdd, regdate ) values ( #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userpw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthyyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_timestamp
)

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'count' FROM usert AS ut JOIN usercode AS uc ON ut.usertypecode = uc.code WHERE ut.usertypecode NOT IN ("TT", "ST")
AND ut.${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%');

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (
select
sn, userid,
schoolunivfk ,
'' elsname ,
userpw, username, usertype, snstype, usyear, usban, usbun, email, mobile, notiemail, notiesms, birthyyyymmdd, tutortype, activearea, addr, usimg, memo1, bankimg, regimg, careerimg, etcdocu1, etcdocu2, bankacc, gradu, kocode, utjcode1, utjcode2, utjcode3,
sppg3, spp3, sppsdate3, sppg2, spp2, sppsdate2, sppg1, spp1, sppsdate1,
jobm3, jobg3, jobedate3, jobsdate3, job3, jobm2, jobg2, jobedate2, jobsdate2, job2, jobm1, jobg1, jobedate1, jobsdate1, job1, result3, result2, result1, schedate1, schedate2, schedate3, schsdate1, schsdate2, schsdate3, grd3, grd2, grd1, sch3, sch2, sch1,tchjik,tchphone2,ttfile,ttppt,zipcode
from usert ) zz
where usertype = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
${item} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword},'%' )

select
from usert where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and userpw = #{userpw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT userid,username,usyear,usban,usbun FROM usert WHERE usertype = 'ST' AND userid IN ( SELECT studentid from contactusdetailstudent WHERE ctudsn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
